    How Aceable Wins


    • FAQs
    • DETAILS

    Are there any hidden fees?
    No here at Aceable! The only other charges are by your local DMV office

    What are the system requirements?
    Here's what you need for the course to work:

    • Either an iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, Android phone, Android Tablet, laptop or desktop computer.
    • An internet connection (wi-fi or cellurar

    Can I try it out before purchasing?
    YES! The first three levels are a gift to you! Try it out and if you like it, you can purchase the full course. We also offer a money back guarantee.

    What's included in the price?
    For this one time purchase, here's what you get:

    • California DMV-approved Drivers Education course
    • Unlimited Free Practice Tests to make sure you pass the test at the DMV office
    • Driving manager to track your behind the wheel hours
    • For parents: tools to monitor your teen's progress, plus guidance on how to do the in-car pracice
